text: Joachim Kunert (24 September 1929 â€“ 18 September 2020) was a German movie director and screenwriter.Joachim Kunert ist tot He directed more than 20 movies between 1954 and 1989. His 1965 movie The Adventures of Werner Holt was entered into the 4th Moscow International Film Festival. He was born in Berlin. Kunert died on 18 September 2020 at the age of 90. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2020 deaths Category:German movie directors Category:German screenwriters Category:Writers from Berlin
